definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The lawyers dissected his claim for damages.
sentences.chinese: 律師們仔細分析了他提出的賠償要求。

sentences.english: Each catalog covers a lot of sub-factors.
sentences.chinese: 而每一大類中又可細分爲很多小的影響因素。

sentences.english: In this section we will analyze the business case and problem in detail.
sentences.chinese: 在本部分中，我們將詳細分析業務案例和問題。

sentences.english: Something that helped me get a handle on this was mini tasking my to-do list.
sentences.chinese: 有所幫助的事就是將要做的清單上的任務再細分。
考慮把你的訪客進行細分。

sentences.english: Analysis of the retrograde sequence of AP activation may localize and ablate the APs successfully.
sentences.chinese: 仔細分析旁路逆傳激動順序可以精確定位，成功消蝕。

sentences.english: But the ability to segment data does not end there.
sentences.chinese: 不過，細分數據所能做到的並非僅此而已。

sentences.english: The limited resources makes the business enterprise be able to choose to subdivide a market limitedly.
sentences.chinese: 有限的資源使企業只能選擇有限的細分市場。

sentences.english: Let's now take the first steps past text processing, narrowly construed.
sentences.chinese: 現在讓我們來詳細分析文本處理的首要步驟。

sentences.english: Server hosting business can be divided into machine hosting and virtual host.
sentences.chinese: 服務器託管業務可細分爲整機託管與虛擬主機。

sentences.english: Chapter two labored the tinctures and sorts of risk of stock market.
sentences.chinese: 第二章對股票市場風險的特徵及分類進行了詳細分析。

sentences.english: The clauses could be subdivided into sub-clauses.
sentences.chinese: 條目之下可再細分爲款。

sentences.english: Section 2 analyzes the artistic characteristic of the opera "Regret for the Past" in detail ;
sentences.chinese: 第二部分詳細分析了歌劇《傷逝》的藝術特徵。

sentences.english: Then, the standardization and recommendation of OTN are analysed in chapter 2.
sentences.chinese: 第二章詳細分析了OTN相關建議以及標準。

sentences.english: The supporting characteristics of roadways driving along next goaf in repeated mining of strip pillar were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 詳細分析了條帶煤柱復採時沿空掘巷的支護特點。

sentences.english: The paper presents the PDU frame of short message in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細分析了短消息的PDU組幀格式。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
practice (customary action, as opposed to theory)/practical
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
